name: Detecting Psychopathic Leaders in Politics
description: A deep dive into the behavioral patterns of authoritarian and psychopathic political figures.

cards.title: Identifying Psychopathic Leadership Traits
cards.description: Recognizing the key psychological traits that indicate psychopathy in political figures.
bulletpoints: Understanding the Machiavellian mindset in politics.
Spotting narcissistic and sadistic traits in leadership behaviors.
Analyzing speech patterns for deception and manipulation.

cards.title: Analyzing the Cult of Personality
cards.description: Breaking down how political psychopaths build mass followings through charisma and manipulation.
bulletpoints: Recognizing how leaders manufacture public trust through staged empathy.
Deconstructing mass psychology tactics used to create political fanaticism.
Identifying the use of symbolic gestures and coded messaging in speeches.

cards.title: Undermining Psychopathic Leadership Influence
cards.description: Strategies to expose and disrupt manipulative political figures without retaliation.
bulletpoints: Using strategic leaks and controlled information releases.
Undermining their perceived omnipotence through public exposure.
Leveraging their own tactics against them to fracture their power base.
